attributes.action: Prevent UK Military Involvement and Funding in Ukraine Conflict
attributes.additional_details:
The UK must focus on domestic priorities—healthcare, education, and cost-of-living relief—rather than escalating foreign conflicts.

This involvement risks dragging the UK into a broader war, endangering our security and economy. We call for neutrality, diplomatic peace efforts, and redirecting taxpayer funds to support British people. Act now to prioritise the UK’s needs and safety.
attributes.background:
We demand the UK Government stop all financial and military support for the Ukraine-Russia conflict, including funding and troop deployment.

If there isn’t money for the Winter Fuel Allowance to help our own citizens stay warm, there isn’t money for war abroad.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions, which call for similar action:

Stop sending military aid to Ukraine
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/702525

Don't send troops to Ukraine to support peacekeeping
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/705814

Referendum on the UK to be neutral on Ukraine and end all bilateral agreements
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/714303

Hold a referendum on continued UK support for Ukraine
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/702489

Seek to start peace talks between Russia and Ukraine
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/702643
